books.title: The Alchemist
books.author: Paulo Coelho
books.overview: A magical story about following your dreams and listening to your heart.

books.author: George Orwell
books.overview: A dystopian novel that explores totalitarianism, surveillance, and censorship.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.overview: A classic novel about racial injustice and the loss of innocence in the American South.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.overview: A romantic novel that explores manners, upbringing, morality, and marriage in early 19th century England.

books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.overview: A critique of the American Dream through the tragic story of Jay Gatsby and his unrequited love.
